titleStmt.title: A new year's gift for Sir Bartholomew Shower
titleStmt.author: Percival, Thomas, fl. 1696-1697.

notesStmt.note: Contains signatures: p. [1], Tho. Percivall; p. [2], T.P.
Includes copies of letter from John Tillotson to Sir Edward Atkins, and address of Sir Bartholomew Shower.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
